title: Survivor(?)

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Use your powerful metal bedframe to perform any ability from any base-game town protective role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You start the game with a random target (your sibling). They know you're siblings and you can speak to each other at night.
- You are cleaned once you die.
- When you die, if you win, you are expected to help your sibling win.
- When dead, your sibling can't talk to you, however you are re-added to the game as a hidden player. No one is aware you are still playing. You are functionally dead and cannot be targeted at night, cannot vote during the day, cannot talk or whisper, etc.
- While you are playing secretly, your powerful metal bedframe can only use 1 ability every full moon. However, you can use any ability from any Town Killing or Town Protective role. Players who see you (ie: lookout) see a "Large robotic metal bed frame" instead of a player. In all system messages you appear as a large robotic metal bed frame instead of a player, and if kill-messages are on they see that as well.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4348
*The survivor programmed a robotic metal bed frame. After his death, it continued to act independently based on its old code. It acts almost human, trying to protect its maker's sister, sometimes acting irrationally.*
